stepPackage
Class AAAStepUp

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
      stepPackage.AAAStepUp
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener
public class AAAStepUp
extends javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
implements javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener

This is the main class (MIDlet) were the j2me application starts executing

Suha

startlist

javax.microedition.lcdui.List startlist
the main menu list it includes:

Start: it includes number of steps walked, number of meters walked, and number of calories burned.

Progress: it shows the progress of the team members, the progress include number of steps every members walked during the day.

History: the user can choose the a specific period and check the progress of his grop

joinlist

javax.microedition.lcdui.List joinlist
the list that will be displayed when you open the application for the first time. If you did not register the list will appear untill you register and fill your profile information.

It consist of :

create new group

Join group

stepview

StepsView stepview
use the object to display No. of steps walked, distance walked in km and number of calories burned in Kcal.

Method Detail

createCommands

private void createCommands()
create the application commands and give them priority which include: Exit command to exit the application. Back command to go back from the application to the main screen. Help command to take the user to the help instructions.

addCommands

private void addCommands()
Add the commands back and exit tot he main list.

startdeamon

void startdeamon()
Alert the watcher deamon that the application started.

enddeamon

void enddeamon()
Alert the watcher deamon that the application closed.

startStepCounting

void startStepCounting()
This function get called if this is the first time the user open the application or he/she have not finish registration process. The function do the following:

1- get the user information from the mobile database this information.

2- start recive number of walked steps from the step counter deamon.

3- connect to step up database on the server to get the daily, weekly and team progress.

4- set the application to get the progress every specific time interval.

startApp

public void startApp()
This function is called when the system activates the MIDlet.

IT check if this is the first time the user opens the application it display "Create/join" list and if the user have created group then it only display "Join Group" list's item and if the user already registed it diplay the main menu.

Specified by:
startApp in class javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet

startStepUpMenu

void startStepUpMenu()
This function get called if the user have registed before which mean his information is saved in the mobile. The function do the following:

1- get the user information from the mobile database.

2- start recive number of walked steps from the step counter deamon.

3- connect to step up database on the server to get the daily, weekly and team progress.

4- set the application to get the progress every specific time interval.

destroyApp

public void destroyApp(boolean unconditional)
Before the application exit it make sure that the gps is not runing and if it was, it stops the gps and save the journy data. Also, it check if splashScreen= false. This means the application started and the accelometer client,call log client and key capture client is running so it closes them. Finally, call notifyDestroyed().

Specified by:
destroyApp in class javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
Parameters:
unconditional - if true it destroy the application if it is false it will not destroy the application.
